ComicInfo.Title: The Season of the Witch
ComicInfo.Summary: The Wickedest Witch consolidates her power as the new Queen of the Goblins. General Jinjur and Jack Pumpkinhead, on a mission to discover the source of the mysterious southern volcano, meet the Witch, with disastrous consequences. Meanwhile, Queen Ozma decides to embark on a diplomatic mission to Quadling Country to stop what may become a deadly Civil War in the land of Oz. Based on the Wonderful Wizard of Oz books.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev57 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-09 18:22:24. [Issue ID 43220]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cowardly Lion,Jinjur,Wicked Witch of the West,Scraps,Ozma,Saw-Horse,Wizard Of Oz,Jack Pumpkinhead,Amber Ombi,Tik-Tok
